body: Please use `std::unordered_set`. Its search, insertion, and removal have average constant-time complexity. `std::set` maintains order and has logarithm time complexity for all three operations.
body_html: Please use std::unordered_set. Its search, insertion, and removal have average constant-time complexity. std::set maintains order and has logarithm time complexity for all three operations.
body_text: Please use std::unordered_set. Its search, insertion, and removal have average constant-time complexity. std::set maintains order and has logarithm time complexity for all three operations.
